#summary Simple HowTo

= Introduction =

Use scp-wave to transfer the file test10M in /tmp to /tmp on all the hosts named:
lxb03, lxb04...etc to lxb20 as root user and using the verbose output. Two hosts are off-line in purpose.


= Details =
